Sort by date and type, not BID

title: Sort by date and type, not BID
message:
Sort by date and type, not BID

Sorting by BID is incorrect; it probably sorts by the date the block was added, not when the block takes place.
(See special AMC F block #2956 on Tues, Feb 3, sorted below normal A block #2890 on Wed, Feb 4)
